input.sentences: yes | those smiles are real | we finally did it | we graduated . now on to the real world .
the parents are so proud | does not matter what we are doing | they want to keep taking photos .
hopefully | this angel comes with us through the summer and off to college while we start our journey into adulthood .
yes | another photo of me eating | why do they always get photos of me eating .
dad getting ready to cut the cake | while grandpa gets the ice cream out of the freezer .
output.sentences: The new graduates have bright smiles to begin real world experiences.
They're proud taking photos with their friends.
They're excited to start their new journey after summer.
Many photos are taken like this photo of their friend eating.
Grandpa is getting more ice ready for the party.
